item.title: Redragon K630: A Budget Mechanical Keyboard
item.description:
Background

Recently, I needed a keyboard to pair with my Xiaomi Pad 6. The official Xiaomi keyboard didn’t seem worth its price given its subpar quality and limited use with the tablet alone. That’s when I realized I’d been wanting a mechanical keyboard for a while. I mean, it’s aesthetic, the sound is satisfying, and let’s face it—using one kind of makes you feel more like a programmer. So yeah, I got it for all the wrong reasons, but honestly, I don’t think it was a bad investment.
